mapper.insert: insert into LectureBoard (lectureNo, classCode, cateCode, subcateCode, lectureTitle, lectureContent) values(#{lectureNo}, #{classCode}, #{cateCode}, #{subcateCode}, #{lectureTitle}, #{lectureContent})
mapper.select: select classCode, cateCode, subcateCode, lectureTitle, lectureContent, lectureDate from LectureBoard where lectureNo = #{lectureNo}
select lectureNo, classCode, cateCode, subcateCode, lectureTitle, lectureContent, lectureDate from LectureBoard where bno > 0 order by lectureNo desc, lectureDate desc
